sections.title: Education
skills: Izmir Institute of Technology, Computer Engineering (2012-2017)

experiences.title: Dashboard Configurator
body: Led the development of a dynamic UI template application allowing users to create and interact with customized dashboards for home-automation devices.
Oversaw all aspects of the project including development, sprint planning, estimation, code review, and build management.
Key Achievements:
- Developed a flexible solution for storing and displaying UIs created by end-users.
- Implemented a drag-and-drop designer view for data binding to UI elements.
- Reduced app bundle size by 40%.
- Identified and resolved a significant memory leakage issue.
- Implemented web workers for non-blocking API communication.
Tech stack: Vue, JavaScript, HTML/CSS, SCSS, Vuex, webpack, ESLint, Git

experiences.title: Ginoa.io
body: Contracted for a web3 application focused on NFT bartering and trading.
Responsibilities included:
- Deciding the tech stack and general app layout
- Creating responsive UI elements
- Implementing data binding from APIs.
- Integrated virtualization to render numerous NFTs efficiently with advanced paging/loading capabilities.
Tech stack: React, TypeScript, Tailwind, react-query, Recharts, Headless UI, Vite

experiences.title: NuMessage
body: Contributed to a 'Skype-like' cross-platform and web messaging project.
- Developed new components, wrote documentation, and conducted unit testing.
Tech stack: NativeScript-Vue, Vue, JavaScript, HTML/CSS, SCSS

experiences.title: Frontend Developer (Outsource)
body: Developed and documented several plugins for an e-commerce application using Google Analytics.
Tech stack: NopCommerce, C#, .NET, JavaScript, Google Analytics

experiences.title: Junior Frontend Developer
body: Solely responsible for creating a web-based admin panel for an incident management application used by city halls to receive reports from citizens.
Worked within a small development team, collaborating closely with backend and cross-platform developers.
Tech stack: Angular, TypeScript, rxjs, HTML/CSS
